item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Wednesday, November 13, 2024 at 12:30 PM UTC
item.description:
1. An unearthly spectacle – The untold story of the biggest nuclear bomb (2021) (13 points | 1 comment)
2. No GPS required: our app can now locate underground trains (370 points | 127 comments)
3. We Built a Self-Healing System to Survive a Concurrency Bug at Netflix (166 points | 75 comments)
4. 80286 ATX mainboard based on the IBM 5170 AT PC (87 points | 30 comments)
5. Bypassing regulatory locks, hacking AirPods and Faraday cages (443 points | 132 comments)

7. Hadrius (YC W23) is hiring engineers looking to grow into future founders ( | hide)
8. PgPDF: Pdf Type and Functions for Postgres (28 points | 9 comments)

20. Two upstart search engines are teaming up to take on Google (137 points | 177 comments)
21. Show HN: Open-source Kibana alternative for logs and traces in ClickHouse (104 points | 27 comments)
22. Burial chamber of an ancient Egyptian priestess is discovered after 4k years (108 points | 35 comments)
23. Visualizing World War II (394 points | 82 comments)
24. OpenAI and others seek new path to smarter AI as current methods hit limitations (12 points | 3 comments)
25. How I ship projects at big tech companies (1258 points | 346 comments)
26. Carving your space (31 points | 9 comments)
27. Russian family lived alone in the Siberian wilderness for 40 years (2013) (143 points | 87 comments)
28. Revealing causal links in complex systems: New algorithm shows hidden influences (110 points | 18 comments)
29. Leaving and Waving (556 points | 80 comments)
